title: Daily Planning
App h3: Measure your time and manage it more effectively.
Introduce title1 detail: Registered tasks can be postponed or completed.
Introduce title2: + Don't procrastinate and complete your to-dos.
Introduce title2 detail: Unfinished tasks are automatically postponed to tomorrow.
Introduce title3: + Log and check the time of the day you actually did it.
Introduce title3 detail: You can log time for to-dos with a simple click.
